songs.title: Do It
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Sittin' on my bed with just your t-shirt on (t-shirt on)
Turning up the volume to my favorite song (favorite song)
Boy, I can't lie, what we did last night
You know it's constantly replaying, staying on my mind (on my mind)

[Pre-Chorus]
I'll show you what I like, boy-boy-boy
If you show me what you like, boy-boy-boy
I'll show you what I like, show you what I like, like
If you show me what you like, boy

[Chorus]
If I had a choice, if I had my way
Boy, you know we'd do it every single day (everyday, everyday)
If I had a wish and if I had my way
Boy, you know we'd do it (you know we'd do it) every single day
(Every single, single day)

[Verse 2]
Damn, I wish I didn't feel so hypnotized (hypnotized)
But when I look at you, baby, it's justified (justified)
So I take what I want, and give what I got
To hell with all the rules, they keep us civilized (civilized)

[Pre-Chorus]
I'll show you what I like, boy-boy-boy
If you show me what you like, boy-boy-boy
I'll show you what I like, show you what I like, like
If you show me what you like, boy

[Chorus]
If I had a choice, if I had my way
Boy, you know we'd do it every single day (everyday, everyday)
If I had a wish and if I had my way
Boy, you know we'd do it (you know we'd do it) every single day
(Every single, single day)

[Bridge]
Nowhere I'd rather be than anywhere alone just you and me
I'll be your Tonto, you'll be my Clyde
We'll be together, forever we'll ride
I want you more and more
You're hotter today than the day before
No lie, no lie
No lie, no lie

[Chorus]
If I had a choice, if I had my way (if I had my way)
Boy, you know we'd do it every single day (everyday, everyday)
If I had a wish (if I had a wish) and if I had my way (if I had my way)
Boy, you know we'd do it every single day
(Every single, single day)

[Outro]
I'll show you what I like, boy-boy-boy (oh, I'll show you)
If you show me what you like, boy-boy-boy (oh, I'll show ya)
I'll show you what I like, show you what I like, like
If you show me what you like, boy
